amendment.description: An amendment to increase funds for the National Guard Personnel, Army by $41,492,000 and reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $57 million.

action.text: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Gohmert amendment (A002). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the provisions of the amendment provide for a net increase in budget outlays of the bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
